name: A Single Spore
description:
A Single Spore is a clone of breakout I made during a course about coding in C# with Unity. It is technically the second game I ever completed in Unity, but believe me, you do not want to see the horror show of a text adventure that was my first project.

Although very straight forward, I think the game is reasonably well polished and has a nice pixel art aesthetic. Most of the bugs have been ironed out, but there may be some minor game play peculiarities that I never got round to fixing! Nonetheless, give it a go and let me know what you think!

The level design is, rather embarrassingly, inspired the life cycle of Streptomyces (soil bacteria) that are the focus of my work! 

--Controls--

Mouse to move paddel

Left-click to launch ball
